solve_chains.step_response:
## S1: Identification of the Paper Title

The full title of the paper that proposes the method with a retrieval granularity of phrase is **"Dense X Retrieval: What retrieval granularity should we use?"** [rag-2]. This title indicates a focus on exploring the appropriate level of granularity in retrieval tasks, specifically emphasizing the phrase level. 

In summary, the paper addresses critical considerations regarding how retrieval granularity impacts the effectiveness of information retrieval systems.

solve_chains.step_response:
## S2: Confirmation of the Paper Title

In conclusion, the full title of the paper that proposes the method with a retrieval granularity of phrase is **"Dense X Retrieval: What retrieval granularity should we use?"** [rag-2]. This title succinctly encapsulates the focus of the research, which investigates the implications of retrieval granularity on the effectiveness of information retrieval systems, particularly at the phrase level. 

This confirmation reinforces the significance of understanding how different levels of granularity can influence retrieval outcomes in various applications.
